Palace are looking for a third win in four Premier League games as they travel to Everton, and will hope to get the better of the Goodison Park home crowd.

articles.title: Gareth Southgate set to name injured duo in England's provisional World Cup squad - The Mirror
articles.description: Gareth Southgate will have the chance to submit 55 players to FIFA on Friday for England's provisional World Cup squad before whittling his choices down to just 26 before heading to Qatar
articles.content:
Gareth Southgate will leave the door open for Reece James and Kyle Walker to be part of England 's squad at the World Cup.

articles.title: Liam Keen comment: Wolves are in need of a huge personality - Express & Star
articles.description: With six defeats in 11 games, Wolves are officially in a relegation battle.
articles.content:
